KNIFE.Name: Knife
KNIFE.Description: This carbon steel 7" bladed knife is dual edged with a serrated spine to provide improved stabbing and thrusting capabilities.

HAMMER.Name: Hammer
HAMMER.Description: A robust, multi-purpose hammer with wooden handle and curved claw, this old classic still nails the competition.

BAT.Name: Baseball Bat
BAT.Description: Aluminum baseball bat with leather grip. Lightweight yet powerful for all you big hitters out there.

GOLFCLUB.Name: Golf Club
GOLFCLUB.Description: Standard length, mid iron golf club with rubber grip for a lethal short game.

CROWBAR.Name: Crowbar
CROWBAR.Description: Heavy-duty crowbar forged from high quality, tempered steel for that extra leverage you need to get the job done.

PISTOL.Name: Pistol
PISTOL.Description: Standard handgun. A .45 caliber pistol with a magazine capacity of 12 rounds that can be extended to 16.

COMBATPISTOL.Name: Combat Pistol
COMBATPISTOL.Description: A compact, lightweight, semi-automatic pistol designed for law enforcement and personal defense. 12-round magazine with option to extend to 16 rounds.

APPISTOL.Name: AP Pistol
APPISTOL.Description: High-penetration, fully-automatic pistol. Holds 18 rounds in magazine with option to extend to 36 rounds.

PISTOL50.Name: Pistol .50
PISTOL50.Description: High-impact pistol that delivers immense power but with extremely strong recoil. Holds 9 rounds in magazine.

MICROSMG.Name: Micro SMG
MICROSMG.Description: Combines compact design with a high rate of fire at approximately 700-900 rounds per minute.

SMG.Name: SMG
SMG.Description: This is known as a good all-round submachine gun. Lightweight with an accurate sight and 30-round magazine capacity.

ASSAULTSMG.Name: Assault SMG
ASSAULTSMG.Description: A high-capacity submachine gun that is both compact and lightweight. Holds up to 30 bullets in one magazine.

ASSAULTRIFLE.Name: Assault Rifle
ASSAULTRIFLE.Description: This standard assault rifle boasts a large capacity magazine and long distance accuracy.

CARBINERIFLE.Name: Carbine Rifle
CARBINERIFLE.Description: Combining long distance accuracy with a high-capacity magazine, the carbine rifle can be relied on to make the hit.

ADVANCEDRIFLE.Name: Advanced Rifle
ADVANCEDRIFLE.Description: The most lightweight and compact of all assault rifles, without compromising accuracy and rate of fire.

MG.Name: MG
MG.Description: General purpose machine gun that combines rugged design with dependable performance. Long range penetrative power. Very effective against large groups.

COMBATMG.Name: Combat MG
COMBATMG.Description: Lightweight, compact machine gun that combines excellent maneuverability with a high rate of fire to devastating effect.

PUMPSHOTGUN.Name: Pump Shotgun
PUMPSHOTGUN.Description: Standard shotgun ideal for short-range combat. A high-projectile spread makes up for its lower accuracy at long range.

SAWNOFFSHOTGUN.Name: Sawed-Off Shotgun
SAWNOFFSHOTGUN.Description: This single-barrel, sawed-off shotgun compensates for its low range and ammo capacity with devastating efficiency in close combat.

ASSAULTSHOTGUN.Name: Assault Shotgun
ASSAULTSHOTGUN.Description: Fully automatic shotgun with 8 round magazine and high rate of fire.

BULLPUPSHOTGUN.Name: Bullpup Shotgun
BULLPUPSHOTGUN.Description: More than makes up for its slow, pump-action rate of fire with its range and spread.  Decimates anything in its projectile path.

STUNGUN.Name: Stun Gun
STUNGUN.Description: Fires a projectile that administers a voltage capable of temporarily stunning an assailant. Takes approximately 4 seconds to recharge after firing.

SNIPERRIFLE.Name: Sniper Rifle
SNIPERRIFLE.Description: Standard sniper rifle. Ideal for situations that require accuracy at long range. Limitations include slow reload speed and very low rate of fire.

HEAVYSNIPER.Name: Heavy Sniper
HEAVYSNIPER.Description: Features armor-piercing rounds for heavy damage. Comes with laser scope as standard.

GRENADELAUNCHER.Name: Grenade Launcher
GRENADELAUNCHER.Description: A compact, lightweight grenade launcher with semi-automatic functionality. Holds up to 10 rounds.

RPG.Name: RPG
RPG.Description: A portable, shoulder-launched, anti-tank weapon that fires explosive warheads. Very effective for taking down vehicles or large groups of assailants.

MINIGUN.Name: Minigun
MINIGUN.Description: A devastating 6-barrel machine gun that features Gatling-style rotating barrels. Very high rate of fire (2000 to 6000 rounds per minute).

GRENADE.Name: Grenade
GRENADE.Description: Standard fragmentation grenade. Pull pin, throw, then find cover. Ideal for eliminating clustered assailants.

STICKYBOMB.Name: Sticky Bomb
STICKYBOMB.Description: A plastic explosive charge fitted with a remote detonator. Can be thrown and then detonated or attached to a vehicle then detonated.

SMOKEGRENADE.Name: Tear Gas
SMOKEGRENADE.Description: Tear gas grenade, particularly effective at incapacitating multiple assailants. Sustained exposure can be lethal.

MOLOTOV.Name: Molotov
MOLOTOV.Description: Crude yet highly effective incendiary weapon. No happy hour with this cocktail.

PETROLCAN.Name: Jerry Can
PETROLCAN.Description: Leaves a trail of gasoline that can be ignited.

REVOLVER.Name: Heavy Revolver
REVOLVER.Description: A handgun with enough stopping power to drop a crazed rhino, and heavy enough to beat it to death if you're out of ammo. Part of Executives and Other Criminals.

SWITCHBLADE.Name: Switchblade
SWITCHBLADE.Description: From your pocket to hilt-deep in the other guy's ribs in under a second: folding knives will never go out of style. Part of Executives and Other Criminals.

STONE_HATCHET.Name: Stone Hatchet
STONE_HATCHET.Description: There's retro, there's vintage, and there's this. After 500 years of technological development and spiritual apocalypse, pre-Colombian chic is back.

BOTTLE.Name: Bottle
BOTTLE.Description: It's not clever and it's not pretty but, most of the time, neither is the guy coming at you with a knife. When all else fails, this gets the job done. Part of the Beach Bum Pack.

SNSPISTOL.Name: SNS Pistol
SNSPISTOL.Description: Like condoms or hairspray, this fits in your pocket for a night out in a Vinewood club. It's half as accurate as a champagne cork but twice as deadly. Part of the Beach Bum Pack.

AUTOSHOTGUN.Name: Sweeper Shotgun
AUTOSHOTGUN.Description: How many effective tools for riot control can you tuck into your pants? OK, two. But this is the other one. Part of Bikers.

BATTLEAXE.Name: Battle Axe
BATTLEAXE.Description: If it's good enough for medieval foot soldiers, modern border guards and pushy soccer moms, it's good enough for you. Part of Bikers.

COMPACTLAUNCHER.Name: Compact Grenade Launcher
COMPACTLAUNCHER.Description: Focus groups using the regular model suggested it was too accurate and found it awkward to use with one hand on the throttle. Easy fix. Part of Bikers.

MINISMG.Name: Mini SMG
MINISMG.Description: Increasingly popular since the marketing team looked beyond spec ops units and started caring about the little guys in low income areas. Part of Bikers.

PIPEBOMB.Name: Pipe Bomb
PIPEBOMB.Description: Remember, it doesn't count as an IED when you buy it in a store and use it in a first world country. Part of Bikers.

POOLCUE.Name: Pool Cue
POOLCUE.Description: Ah, there's no sound as satisfying as the crack of a perfect break, especially when it's the other guy's spine. Part of Bikers.

WRENCH.Name: Pipe Wrench
WRENCH.Description: Perennial favourite of apocalyptic survivalists and violent fathers the world over, apparently it also doubles as some kind of tool. Part of Bikers.

HEAVYPISTOL.Name: Heavy Pistol
HEAVYPISTOL.Description: The heavyweight champion of the magazine fed, semi-automatic handgun world. Delivers a serious forearm workout every time. Part of The Business Update.

SPECIALCARBINE.Name: Special Carbine
SPECIALCARBINE.Description: Combining accuracy, maneuverability and low recoil, this is an extremely versatile assault rifle for any combat situation. Part of The Business Update.

BULLPUPRIFLE.Name: Bullpup Rifle
BULLPUPRIFLE.Description: The latest Chinese import taking America by storm, this rifle is known for its balanced handling. Lightweight and very controllable in automatic fire. Part of The High Life Update.

HOMINGLAUNCHER.Name: Homing Launcher
HOMINGLAUNCHER.Description: Infrared guided fire-and-forget missile launcher. For all your moving target needs. Part of the Festive Surprise.

PROXMINE.Name: Proximity Mine
PROXMINE.Description: Leave a present for your friends with these motion sensor landmines. Short delay after activation. Part of the Festive Surprise.

BULLPUPRIFLE_MK2.Name: Bullpup Rifle Mk II
BULLPUPRIFLE_MK2.Description: So precise, so exquisite, it's not so much a hail of bullets as a symphony.

BULLPUPRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_TRACER.Name: Tracer Rounds
BULLPUPRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_TRACER.Description: Bullets with bright visible markers that match the tint of the gun. Standard capacity.

BULLPUPRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY.Name: Incendiary Rounds
BULLPUPRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY.Description: Bullets which include a chance to set targets on fire when shot. Reduced capacity.

BULLPUPRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_ARMORPIERCING.Name: Armor Piercing Rounds
BULLPUPRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_ARMORPIERCING.Description: Increased penetration of Body Armor. Reduced capacity.

BULLPUPRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_FMJ.Name: Full Metal Jacket Rounds
BULLPUPRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_FMJ.Description: Increased damage to vehicles. Also penetrates bullet resistant and bulletproof vehicle glass. Reduced capacity.

AT_SIGHTS.Name: Holographic Sight
AT_SIGHTS.Description: Accurate sight for close quarters combat.

AT_BP_BARREL_02.Name: Heavy Barrel
AT_BP_BARREL_02.Description: Increases damage dealt to long-range targets.

DOUBLEACTION.Name: Double-Action Revolver
DOUBLEACTION.Description: Because sometimes revenge is a dish best served six times, in quick succession, right between the eyes. Part of The Doomsday Heist.

MARKSMANRIFLE_MK2.Name: Marksman Rifle Mk II
MARKSMANRIFLE_MK2.Description: Known in military circles as The Dislocator, this mod set will destroy both the target and your shoulder, in that order.

MARKSMANRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_TRACER.Name: Tracer Rounds
MARKSMANRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_TRACER.Description: Bullets with bright visible markers that match the tint of the gun. Standard capacity.

MARKSMANRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY.Name: Incendiary Rounds
MARKSMANRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY.Description: Bullets which include a chance to set targets on fire when shot. Reduced capacity.

MARKSMANRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_ARMORPIERCING.Name: Armor Piercing Rounds
MARKSMANRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_ARMORPIERCING.Description: Increased penetration of Body Armor. Reduced capacity.

MARKSMANRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_FMJ.Name: Full Metal Jacket Rounds
MARKSMANRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_FMJ.Description: Increased damage to vehicles. Also penetrates bullet resistant and bulletproof vehicle glass. Reduced capacity.

AT_SIGHTS.Name: Holographic Sight
AT_SIGHTS.Description: Accurate sight for close quarters combat.

AT_MRFL_BARREL_02.Name: Heavy Barrel
AT_MRFL_BARREL_02.Description: Increases damage dealt to long-range targets.

PUMPSHOTGUN_MK2.Name: Pump Shotgun Mk II
PUMPSHOTGUN_MK2.Description: Only one thing pumps more action than a pump action: watch out, the recoil is almost as deadly as the shot.

PUMPSHOTGUN_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY.Name: Dragon's Breath Shells
PUMPSHOTGUN_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY.Description: Has a chance to set targets on fire when shot.

PUMPSHOTGUN_MK2_CLIP_HOLLOWPOINT.Name: Flechette Shells
PUMPSHOTGUN_MK2_CLIP_HOLLOWPOINT.Description: Increased damage to targets without Body Armor.

AT_SIGHTS.Name: Holographic Sight
AT_SIGHTS.Description: Accurate sight for close quarters combat.

REVOLVER_MK2.Name: Heavy Revolver Mk II
REVOLVER_MK2.Description: If you can lift it, this is the closest you'll get to shooting someone with a freight train.

REVOLVER_MK2_CLIP_TRACER.Name: Tracer Rounds
REVOLVER_MK2_CLIP_TRACER.Description: Bullets with bright visible markers that match the tint of the gun.

REVOLVER_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY.Name: Incendiary Rounds
REVOLVER_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY.Description: Bullets which set targets on fire when shot.

REVOLVER_MK2_CLIP_HOLLOWPOINT.Name: Hollow Point Rounds
REVOLVER_MK2_CLIP_HOLLOWPOINT.Description: Increased damage to targets without Body Armor.

REVOLVER_MK2_CLIP_FMJ.Name: Full Metal Jacket Rounds
REVOLVER_MK2_CLIP_FMJ.Description: Increased damage to vehicles. Also penetrates bullet resistant and bulletproof vehicle glass.

AT_SIGHTS.Name: Holographic Sight
AT_SIGHTS.Description: Accurate sight for close quarters combat.

SNSPISTOL_MK2.Name: SNS Pistol Mk II
SNSPISTOL_MK2.Description: The ultimate purse-filler: if you want to make Saturday Night really special, this is your ticket.

SNSPISTOL_MK2_CLIP_TRACER.Name: Tracer Rounds
SNSPISTOL_MK2_CLIP_TRACER.Description: Bullets with bright visible markers that match the tint of the gun.

SNSPISTOL_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY.Name: Incendiary Rounds
SNSPISTOL_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY.Description: Bullets which include a chance to set targets on fire when shot.

SNSPISTOL_MK2_CLIP_HOLLOWPOINT.Name: Hollow Point Rounds
SNSPISTOL_MK2_CLIP_HOLLOWPOINT.Description: Increased damage to targets without Body Armor.

SNSPISTOL_MK2_CLIP_FMJ.Name: Full Metal Jacket Rounds
SNSPISTOL_MK2_CLIP_FMJ.Description: Increased damage to vehicles. Also penetrates bullet resistant and bulletproof vehicle glass.

SPECIALCARBINE_MK2.Name: Special Carbine Mk II
SPECIALCARBINE_MK2.Description: The jack of all trades just got a serious upgrade: bow to the master.

SPECIALCARBINE_MK2_CLIP_TRACER.Name: Tracer Rounds
SPECIALCARBINE_MK2_CLIP_TRACER.Description: Bullets with bright visible markers that match the tint of the gun. Standard capacity.

SPECIALCARBINE_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY.Name: Incendiary Rounds
SPECIALCARBINE_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY.Description: Bullets which include a chance to set targets on fire when shot. Reduced capacity.

SPECIALCARBINE_MK2_CLIP_ARMORPIERCING.Name: Armor Piercing Rounds
SPECIALCARBINE_MK2_CLIP_ARMORPIERCING.Description: Increased penetration of Body Armor. Reduced capacity.

SPECIALCARBINE_MK2_CLIP_FMJ.Name: Full Metal Jacket Rounds
SPECIALCARBINE_MK2_CLIP_FMJ.Description: Increased damage to vehicles. Also penetrates bullet resistant and bulletproof vehicle glass. Reduced capacity.

AT_SIGHTS.Name: Holographic Sight
AT_SIGHTS.Description: Accurate sight for close quarters combat.

AT_SC_BARREL_02.Name: Heavy Barrel
AT_SC_BARREL_02.Description: Increases damage dealt to long-range targets.

RAYPISTOL.Name: Up-n-Atomizer
RAYPISTOL.Description: Republican Space Ranger Special, fresh from the galactic war on socialism: no ammo, no mag, just one brutal energy pulse after another.

RAYPISTOL_VARMOD_XMAS18.Name: Festive tint
RAYPISTOL_VARMOD_XMAS18.Description: The Festive tint for the Up-n-Atomizer.

RAYCARBINE.Name: Unholy Hellbringer
RAYCARBINE.Description: Republican Space Ranger Special. If you want to turn a little green man into little green goo, this is the only American way to do it.

RAYMINIGUN.Name: Widowmaker
RAYMINIGUN.Description: Republican Space Ranger Special. GO AHEAD, SAY I'M COMPENSATING FOR SOMETHING. I DARE YOU.

ASSAULTRIFLE_MK2.Name: Assault Rifle Mk II
ASSAULTRIFLE_MK2.Description: The definitive revision of an all-time classic: all it takes is a little work, and looks can kill after all.

ASSAULTRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_TRACER.Name: Tracer Rounds
ASSAULTRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_TRACER.Description: Bullets with bright visible markers that match the tint of the gun. Standard capacity.

ASSAULTRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY.Name: Incendiary Rounds
ASSAULTRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY.Description: Bullets which include a chance to set targets on fire when shot. Reduced capacity.

ASSAULTRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_ARMORPIERCING.Name: Armor Piercing Rounds
ASSAULTRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_ARMORPIERCING.Description: Increased penetration of Body Armor. Reduced capacity.

ASSAULTRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_FMJ.Name: Full Metal Jacket Rounds
ASSAULTRIFLE_MK2_CLIP_FMJ.Description: Increased damage to vehicles. Also penetrates bullet resistant and bulletproof vehicle glass. Reduced capacity.

AT_SIGHTS.Name: Holographic Sight
AT_SIGHTS.Description: Accurate sight for close quarters combat.

AT_AR_BARREL_02.Name: Heavy Barrel
AT_AR_BARREL_02.Description: Increases damage dealt to long-range targets.

CARBINERIFLE_MK2.Name: Carbine Rifle Mk II
CARBINERIFLE_MK2.Description: This is bespoke, artisan firepower: you couldn't deliver a hail of bullets with more love and care if you inserted them by hand.

CARBINERIFLE_MK2_CLIP_TRACER.Name: Tracer Rounds
CARBINERIFLE_MK2_CLIP_TRACER.Description: Bullets with bright visible markers that match the tint of the gun. Standard capacity.

CARBINERIFLE_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY.Name: Incendiary Rounds
CARBINERIFLE_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY.Description: Bullets which include a chance to set targets on fire when shot. Reduced capacity.

CARBINERIFLE_MK2_CLIP_ARMORPIERCING.Name: Armor Piercing Rounds
CARBINERIFLE_MK2_CLIP_ARMORPIERCING.Description: Increased penetration of Body Armor. Reduced capacity.

CARBINERIFLE_MK2_CLIP_FMJ.Name: Full Metal Jacket Rounds
CARBINERIFLE_MK2_CLIP_FMJ.Description: Increased damage to vehicles. Also penetrates bullet resistant and bulletproof vehicle glass. Reduced capacity.

AT_SIGHTS.Name: Holographic Sight
AT_SIGHTS.Description: Accurate sight for close quarters combat.

AT_CR_BARREL_02.Name: Heavy Barrel
AT_CR_BARREL_02.Description: Increases damage dealt to long-range targets.

COMBATMG_MK2.Name: Combat MG Mk II
COMBATMG_MK2.Description: You can never have too much of a good thing: after all, if the first shot counts, then the next hundred or so must count for double.

COMBATMG_MK2_CLIP_TRACER.Name: Tracer Rounds
COMBATMG_MK2_CLIP_TRACER.Description: Bullets with bright visible markers that match the tint of the gun. Standard capacity.

COMBATMG_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY.Name: Incendiary Rounds
COMBATMG_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY.Description: Bullets which include a chance to set targets on fire when shot. Reduced capacity.

COMBATMG_MK2_CLIP_ARMORPIERCING.Name: Armor Piercing Rounds
COMBATMG_MK2_CLIP_ARMORPIERCING.Description: Increased penetration of Body Armor. Reduced capacity.

COMBATMG_MK2_CLIP_FMJ.Name: Full Metal Jacket Rounds
COMBATMG_MK2_CLIP_FMJ.Description: Increased damage to vehicles. Also penetrates bullet resistant and bulletproof vehicle glass. Reduced capacity.

AT_SIGHTS.Name: Holographic Sight
AT_SIGHTS.Description: Accurate sight for close quarters combat.

AT_MG_BARREL_02.Name: Heavy Barrel
AT_MG_BARREL_02.Description: Increases damage dealt to long-range targets.

HEAVYSNIPER_MK2.Name: Heavy Sniper Mk II
HEAVYSNIPER_MK2.Description: Far away, yet always intimate: if you're looking for a secure foundation for that long-distance relationship, this is it.

HEAVYSNIPER_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY.Name: Incendiary Rounds
HEAVYSNIPER_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY.Description: Bullets which set targets on fire when shot. Reduced capacity.

HEAVYSNIPER_MK2_CLIP_ARMORPIERCING.Name: Armor Piercing Rounds
HEAVYSNIPER_MK2_CLIP_ARMORPIERCING.Description: Increased penetration of Body Armor. Reduced capacity.

HEAVYSNIPER_MK2_CLIP_FMJ.Name: Full Metal Jacket Rounds
HEAVYSNIPER_MK2_CLIP_FMJ.Description: Increased damage to vehicles. Also penetrates bullet resistant and bulletproof vehicle glass. Reduced capacity.

HEAVYSNIPER_MK2_CLIP_EXPLOSIVE.Name: Explosive Rounds
HEAVYSNIPER_MK2_CLIP_EXPLOSIVE.Description: Bullets which explode on impact. Reduced capacity.

AT_SCOPE_NV.Name: Night Vision Scope
AT_SCOPE_NV.Description: Long-range zoom with toggleable night vision.

AT_SCOPE_THERMAL.Name: Thermal Scope
AT_SCOPE_THERMAL.Description: Long-range zoom with toggleable thermal vision.

AT_SR_BARREL_02.Name: Heavy Barrel
AT_SR_BARREL_02.Description: Increases damage dealt to long-range targets.

PISTOL_MK2.Name: Pistol Mk II
PISTOL_MK2.Description: Balance, simplicity, precision: nothing keeps the peace like an extended barrel in the other guy's mouth.

PISTOL_MK2_CLIP_TRACER.Name: Tracer Rounds
PISTOL_MK2_CLIP_TRACER.Description: Bullets with bright visible markers that match the tint of the gun. Standard capacity.

PISTOL_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY.Name: Incendiary Rounds
PISTOL_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY.Description: Bullets which include a chance to set targets on fire when shot. Reduced capacity.

PISTOL_MK2_CLIP_HOLLOWPOINT.Name: Hollow Point Rounds
PISTOL_MK2_CLIP_HOLLOWPOINT.Description: Increased damage to targets without Body Armor. Reduced capacity.

PISTOL_MK2_CLIP_FMJ.Name: Full Metal Jacket Rounds
PISTOL_MK2_CLIP_FMJ.Description: Increased damage to vehicles. Also penetrates bullet resistant and bulletproof vehicle glass. Reduced capacity.

SMG_MK2.Name: SMG Mk II
SMG_MK2.Description: Lightweight, compact, with a rate of fire to die very messily for: turn any confined space into a kill box at the click of a well-oiled trigger.

SMG_MK2_CLIP_TRACER.Name: Tracer Rounds
SMG_MK2_CLIP_TRACER.Description: Bullets with bright visible markers that match the tint of the gun. Standard capacity.

SMG_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY.Name: Incendiary Rounds
SMG_MK2_CLIP_INCENDIARY.Description: Bullets which include a chance to set targets on fire when shot. Reduced capacity.

SMG_MK2_CLIP_HOLLOWPOINT.Name: Hollow Point Rounds
SMG_MK2_CLIP_HOLLOWPOINT.Description: Increased damage to targets without Body Armor. Reduced capacity.

SMG_MK2_CLIP_FMJ.Name: Full Metal Jacket Rounds
SMG_MK2_CLIP_FMJ.Description: Increased damage to vehicles. Also penetrates bullet resistant and bulletproof vehicle glass. Reduced capacity.

AT_SIGHTS_SMG.Name: Holographic Sight
AT_SIGHTS_SMG.Description: Accurate sight for close quarters combat.

AT_SB_BARREL_02.Name: Heavy Barrel
AT_SB_BARREL_02.Description: Increases damage dealt to long-range targets.

FLASHLIGHT.Name: Flashlight
FLASHLIGHT.Description: Intensify your fear of the dark with this short range, battery-powered light source. Handy for blunt force trauma. Part of The Halloween Surprise.

FLAREGUN.Name: Flare Gun
FLAREGUN.Description: Use to signal distress or drunken excitement. Warning: pointing directly at individuals may cause spontaneous combustion. Part of The Heists Update.

DAGGER.Name: Antique Cavalry Dagger
DAGGER.Description: You've been rocking the pirate-chic look for a while, but no vicious weapon to complete the look? Get this dagger with guarded hilt. Part of The "I'm Not a Hipster" Update.

VINTAGEPISTOL.Name: Vintage Pistol
VINTAGEPISTOL.Description: What you really need is a more recognizable gun. Stand out from the crowd at an armed robbery with this engraved pistol. Part of The "I'm Not a Hipster" Update.

FIREWORK.Name: Firework Launcher
FIREWORK.Description: Put the flair back in flare with this firework launcher, guaranteed to raise some oohs and aahs from the crowd. Part of the Independence Day Special.

MUSKET.Name: Musket
MUSKET.Description: Armed with nothing but muskets and a superiority complex, the Brits took over half the world. Own the gun that built an empire. Part of the Independence Day Special.

MACHETE.Name: Machete
MACHETE.Description: America's West African arms trade isn't just about giving. Rediscover the simple life with this rusty cleaver. Part of Lowriders.

MACHINEPISTOL.Name: Machine Pistol
MACHINEPISTOL.Description: This fully automatic is the snare drum to your twin-engine V8 bass: no drive-by sounds quite right without it. Part of Lowriders.

COMPACTRIFLE.Name: Compact Rifle
COMPACTRIFLE.Description: Half the size, all the power, double the recoil: there's no riskier way to say "I'm compensating for something". Part of Lowriders: Custom Classics.

DBSHOTGUN.Name: Double Barrel Shotgun
DBSHOTGUN.Description: Do one thing, do it well. Who needs a high rate of fire when your first shot turns the other guy into a fine mist? Part of Lowriders: Custom Classics.

HEAVYSHOTGUN.Name: Heavy Shotgun
HEAVYSHOTGUN.Description: The weapon to reach for when you absolutely need to make a horrible mess of the room. Best used near easy-wipe surfaces only. Part of the Last Team Standing Update.

MARKSMANRIFLE.Name: Marksman Rifle
MARKSMANRIFLE.Description: Whether you're up close or a disconcertingly long way away, this weapon will get the job done. A multi-range tool for tools. Part of the Last Team Standing Update.

COMBATPDW.Name: Combat PDW
COMBATPDW.Description: Who said personal weaponry couldn't be worthy of military personnel? Thanks to our lobbyists, not Congress. Integral suppressor. Part of the Ill-Gotten Gains Update Part 1.

KNUCKLE.Name: Knuckle Duster
KNUCKLE.Description: Perfect for knocking out gold teeth, or as a gift to the trophy partner who has everything. Part of The Ill-Gotten Gains Update Part 2.

MARKSMANPISTOL.Name: Marksman Pistol
MARKSMANPISTOL.Description: Not for the risk averse. Make it count as you'll be reloading as much as you shoot. Part of The Ill-Gotten Gains Update Part 2.

GUSENBERG.Name: Gusenberg Sweeper
GUSENBERG.Description: Complete your look with a Prohibition gun. Looks great being fired from an Albany Roosevelt or paired with a pinstripe suit. Part of the Valentine's Day Massacre Special.

HATCHET.Name: Hatchet
HATCHET.Description: Make kindling... of your pals with this easy to wield, easy to hide hatchet. Exclusive content for returning players.

RAILGUN.Name: Railgun
RAILGUN.Description: All you need to know is - magnets, and it does horrible things to the things it's pointed at. Exclusive content for returning players.
